meta.description: Minimize the total length of the street occupied by cars while ensuring no more than 15 meters are occupied on one side.

params.name: length
params.description: Length of each car in meters

vars.name: x
vars.description: 1 if car is parked on the left side, 0 otherwise

vars.name: y
vars.description: 1 if car is parked on the right side, 0 otherwise

objective.name: min_total_length
objective.expr: sum(length[c] * (x[c] + y[c]) for c in CARS)
objective.description: Minimize the total length of the street occupied by cars

constraints.name: car_1_side
constraints.description: Car 1 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_2_side
constraints.description: Car 2 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_3_side
constraints.description: Car 3 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_4_side
constraints.description: Car 4 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_5_side
constraints.description: Car 5 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_6_side
constraints.description: Car 6 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_7_side
constraints.description: Car 7 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_8_side
constraints.description: Car 8 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_9_side
constraints.description: Car 9 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_10_side
constraints.description: Car 10 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_11_side
constraints.description: Car 11 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_12_side
constraints.description: Car 12 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_13_side
constraints.description: Car 13 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_14_side
constraints.description: Car 14 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: car_15_side
constraints.description: Car 15 must be parked on exactly one side

constraints.name: left_side_limit
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(length[c] * x[c] for c in CARS)
constraints.description: Total length of cars on the left side cannot exceed 15 meters
